text:
Batton Lash (October 29, 1953 – January 12, 2019) was an American comics creator. He was best known for the series "Wolff and Byrd, Counselors of the Macabre" (aka "Supernatural Law"). He won many awards for his work, including an Inkpot Award, an Independent Book Publishers Association's Benjamin Franklin Award, an Eisner Award, and nominations for two Harvey Awards.
Lash died at the age of 65 from brain cancer in San Diego, California.
